item.title: Another issue on this road!, 28th January
item.description:
Getting deeper and dangerous to avoid due to the width of the road.

item.title: Crater not pothole!, 28th January
item.description:
Ridiculous! This is a tyre and suspension killer! Been here for ages now.

item.title: Small area of the road with a leak, 28th January
item.description:
Water is leaking out of a pot hole in the road right on the roundabout. In icy weather this freezes and and is very slippery and a skid risk being right on the roundabout. The water pools around the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Ditches have been filled, 28th January
item.description:
Ditches have been filled by gigaclear and now there is no where for surface water to drain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brock Farm Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
